UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Legume Plant Peptides as Sources of Novel Antimicrobial Molecules Against Human Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Lima RM, Rathod BB, Tiricz H, Howan DHO, Al Bouni MA, Jenei S, Timar E, Endre G, Tóth GK, Kondorosi É

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MBC=25µM),Staphylococcus aureus HNCMO 112011(MBC=25µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19111(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=25µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 13440(no activity data),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=3.125µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(no activity data)
